room_title: Escape room "Hermit's Lair" by Exitus Escape Rooms in Salem
review: We did The Legend of the Hermit room tonight and escaped with a few minutes to spare. I had accidentally scheduled us for next week, but the staff member was willing to stay and set up the room for us. I appreciated him going out of our way so we could get to experience the room. Thanks again Exitus, we look forward to coming back.

room_title: Escape room "Hermit's Lair" by Exitus Escape Rooms in Salem
review: Really fun. Did the Hermit room. Really makes you think afterwards. Thanks, Travis!
